Description: Genuine BMW Watch !!! Discontinued model from 2000's. Limited edition to 300 pieces ever made Swiss movement inside. Ultra rare as brand new in the box. Super square rare design with one of the most beautifully dials from my entire collection. A brushed stainless steel square case with a very rare design for the lugs that holds the leather band and a mineral crystal glass, will safeguard your precious timepiece for many years to come. The silver dial with a white <<Guilloche>> pattern in the center of it, superimposed stainless steel hour markers & Arabic numerals, orange motives that represents the rev counters between 12 and 3 o'clock, BMW roundel at 12 o'clock and date in window at 3 o'clock, will make this elegant yet sporty timepiece, an eye catcher. Luminous hands, hour markers and Arabic numerals. The snap-on stainless steel back that has the BMW roundel laser engraved on it, makes the watch water resistant to 3 ATM. A superb designed classic brown fine leather band, secures the watch on your wrist with a stainless steel buckle.Guillochè (presumably named after a French engineer - Guillot - who invented a turning machine in the 18th century) is a decorative technique in which a repetitive pattern is engraved into an underlying material using a mechanical engine-turning table, also called a rose engine lathe. The Guilloché pattern gives the dial a lot of life. The guilloche dial with the engraved pattern is razor sharp. For each difference in angle and light the dial changes in infinity! High quality Swiss Made movement. Specifications of the quartz movement:Line normtechCaliber 705Version: Swiss Made / 5 jewels / gold plated / E.O.L. Standard battery life 60 months !!! 5 YEARS !!! Functions:Date with quick set function; date in at 6 o'clock 3 hands: hours, minutes, secondsE.O.L. function (changing the battery), the ,,end of life" system: the EOL system of your watch will indicate, when a battery replacement is imminent: the second hand will start jumping in 3-4 seconds steps at which time the remaining power lasts for about one week of operation). Features:Repairable metal watch movementVery long battery lifePower saving mechanism with pulled out stem: reduction of consumption approximately 70%Any question, please ask BEFORE buying !!! I DON'T ACCEPT RETURNS, unless the item is not as described (logically, this will never happen, I provide 110% accurate info, and besides that, you have 12 close up, zoom in activated, pictures) !!! I had tried to make pics from all angles. I do have many watches, but you will get what is seen in the pictures. They are not stock photos.Please review the pictures carefully. They are part of the description. I try my best to provide accurate descriptions and pictures, but occasionally I miss something. Ask before buying, not after. I will consider that you accepted my terms and description. If you are looking for a specific model and I don't have it listed, please ask me. I may have it in my collection or I can find it for you. I am always happy to combine shipping on multiple items, so please take a look at my other watches / items !!! Estimated delivery time after item shipped: EUROPE 5-10 business days REST OF WORLD 10-30 business days I ship within 3 business days of your payment. Please don't hold me responsible for the carriers performance. Payment is required within 2 days of our notification of the total due. Thanks for looking and buying a great and unique item. Have a great day !!!
